about_the_game:
Prank targets while evading the dastardly Fun Police, then try to escape without getting caught! Plan your approach to each level: will you unleash complete mayhem or sneak through undetected? The choice is yours! Explore intriguing locales, meet wacky characters, and utilize your arsenal of clown props to bring joy back to the world!

REACTIVE AND DYNAMIC WORLD

NPC's have a set schedule and react to the things you do which also affects how they interact with each other. If they get pranked or see you playing pranks they will get upset and can take out that frustration on others causing a domino effect of complete pandemonium!

TONS OF EQUIPMENT

This game features DOZENS of tools for you to use with multiple unique interactions waiting to be discovered!

OPTIONS AND REPLAYABILITY

There's no wrong way to play the game, complete objectives any way you see fit. Plan your approach and discover alternate routes, then try missions again using a different strategy.

EXPLORATION AND SECRETS

Each level is densely packed with interesting things to see and hidden secrets to find. You might uncover a hidden piece of equipment, or maybe discover a secret way to play a prank. Keep your eyes (and bananas) peeled!
